mapper.update:
UPDATE wms_warehouse
short_name = #{shortName},
warehouse_name = #{warehouseName},
warehouse_desc = #{warehouseDesc},
warehouse_type = #{warehouseType},
warehousestatus = #{warehousestatus},
is_real_warehouse = #{isRealWarehouse},
storage_type = #{storageType},
function_type = #{functionType},
is_support_tran = #{isSupportTran},
is_support_sby = #{isSupportSby},
flex = #{flex},
stock_type = #{stockType},
is_oem = #{isOem},
business_hours = #{businessHours},
cut_off_time = #{cutOffTime},
country_id = #{countryId},
province_id = #{provinceId},
city_id = #{cityId},
county_id = #{countyId},
address_name = #{addressName},
warehouse_longitude = #{warehouseLongitude},
warehouse_latitude = #{warehouseLatitude},
warehouse_group_email = #{warehouseGroupEmail},
warehouse_phone = #{warehousePhone},
warehouse_fax = #{warehouseFax},
warehouse_contactor = #{warehouseContactor},
warehouse_contactor_mobile = #{warehouseContactorMobile},
rtv_default_express = #{rtvDefaultExpress},
rtv_sp_receive_address = #{rtvSpReceiveAddress},
express_remark = #{expressRemark},
return_duty_person = #{returnDutyPerson},
return_phone = #{returnPhone},
return_mobile = #{returnMobile},
do_return_duty_person = #{doReturnDutyPerson},
do_return_phone = #{doReturnPhone},
do_return_mobile = #{doReturnMobile},
customer_return_address = #{customerReturnAddress},
warehouse_reamrk = #{warehouseReamrk},
platform_id = #{platformId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
